goal.ch:
提升技術溝通能力

培養學生用英語清晰有效地表達複雜技術概念的能力。
掌握簡化術語和技術詞彙的方法，以適應不同受眾需求。
建立公開演講的自信

增強學生在專業和學術環境中進行演講和展示的自信心。
練習克服演講焦慮，改進肢體語言、語調和表達風格。
掌握展示結構與組織技巧

教授學生如何構建清晰的演講框架，包括引言、主體和有影響力的結論。
指導學生將觀點以邏輯性和連貫性的方式組織，確保觀眾的參與感。
整合視覺與多媒體輔助工具

訓練學生設計並有效使用視覺輔助工具來支持技術主題。
鼓勵適當使用多媒體工具來增強展示效果，而不讓觀眾感到負擔。
培養以觀眾為中心的展示技巧

幫助學生分析並適應觀眾的需求、知識水平和興趣。
推廣互動技巧，例如問答環節或觀眾參與，促進有效溝通。
聚焦技術專業內容

將課程主題與技術前沿發展相結合，如創新、人工智慧、可持續性或新興技術。
鼓勵學生展示現實案例或自己的技術專案。
提升批判性思維與說服力

教授學生如何通過基於證據的推理來構建有說服力的論點。
發展應對觀眾提問並有效捍衛觀點的技能。
促進同儕與自我評估

鼓勵學生評估自己和同學的展示，從而改進技能並識別改進空間。
引入評估指標和反思技術以促進持續進步。
為專業場景做好準備

模擬技術會議、產品推介或學術研討會等專業場景，讓學生獲得實際經驗。
指導學生了解禮儀、時間管理以及適應不同演講環境的技巧。
goal.en:
These goals aim to equip students with the essential communication skills required to excel in the technological domain, fostering both their linguistic and professional growth.
Enhance Technical Communication Skills

Develop students‘ ability to articulate complex technological concepts clearly and effectively in English.
Introduce strategies for simplifying jargon and technical terms to suit diverse audiences.
Build Confidence in Public Speaking

Foster students’ self-assurance in delivering speeches and presentations in professional and academic settings.
Practice overcoming speech anxiety and improving body language, tone, and delivery style.
Master Structuring and Organising Presentations

Teach students how to structure their presentations with a clear introduction, well-developed body, and impactful conclusion.
Guide students in organising ideas logically and cohesively to ensure audience engagement.
Integrate Visual and Multimedia Aids

Train students to design and utilise effective visual aids, such as slides or infographics, to support their technological topics.
Encourage the appropriate use of multimedia tools to enhance presentations without overwhelming the audience.
Develop Audience-Centric Presentation Skills

Help students analyse and adapt to their audience’s needs, knowledge levels, and interests.
Promote interactive techniques, such as Q＆A sessions or audience engagement, for effective communication.
Incorporate Technology-Specific Content

Focus on themes like innovation, AI, sustainability, or emerging technologies to align the course content with technological advancements.
Encourage students to present real-world case studies or their own projects in technology.
Enhance Critical Thinking and Persuasion

Teach students how to construct persuasive arguments using evidence-based reasoning.
Develop skills for defending viewpoints and responding to audience questions effectively.
Promote Peer and Self-Evaluation

Encourage students to assess their own and peers’ presentations to refine their skills and identify areas for improvement.
Introduce rubrics and reflection techniques for ongoing growth.
Prepare for Professional Scenarios

Simulate professional contexts such as tech conferences, product pitches, or academic symposia to give students real-world experience.
Offer guidance on etiquette, time management, and adapting to different speaking environments.

outline.ch:
本課程將涵蓋廣泛的主題和觀點，旨在幫助學生掌握在科技領域中進行有效英語溝通所需的技能。課程將講解技術溝通的基本原理，重點在於如何為多樣化的受眾簡化複雜概念，同時保持準確性與清晰度。學生將學習如何有效組織演講，設計具有影響力的開場白、連貫的內容以及令人難忘的結尾。本課程涵蓋以下內容：
Fundamentals of Technical Communication
Simplifying complex concepts and balancing accuracy with clarity.
Structuring Effective Presentations
Crafting introductions, logical content flow, and impactful conclusions.
Visual and Multimedia Aids
Designing slides, infographics, and using multimedia tools effectively.
Storytelling in Technology
Using narratives and real-life examples to engage the audience.
Audience-Centric Techniques
Adapting content to audience needs and promoting interaction.
Persuasive Communication
Building strong arguments with evidence and delivering convincingly.
Advanced Public Speaking Skills
Overcoming anxiety and refining delivery style, tone, and pace.
Professional Presentation Scenarios
Practicing real-world contexts like pitches and academic talks.
Collaborative Presentation Development
Group work on brainstorming, content creation, and rehearsals.
Peer Review and Refinement
Gaining feedback to improve clarity and coherence.
Critical Reflection and Self-Assessment
Evaluating progress in English proficiency and presentation skills.
Real-World Applications
Applying techniques to professional and academic scenarios.
outline.en:
This course will cover a wide range of topics and perspectives to equip students with the skills necessary for effective English communication in technological contexts. It will address the fundamentals of technical communication, focusing on simplifying complex ideas for diverse audiences while maintaining accuracy and clarity. Students will learn to structure presentations effectively, crafting impactful introductions, coherent bodies, and memorable conclusions.This course will cover:
Fundamentals of Technical Communication
Simplifying complex concepts and balancing accuracy with clarity.
Structuring Effective Presentations
Crafting introductions, logical content flow, and impactful conclusions.
Visual and Multimedia Aids
Designing slides, infographics, and using multimedia tools effectively.
Storytelling in Technology
Using narratives and real-life examples to engage the audience.
Audience-Centric Techniques
Adapting content to audience needs and promoting interaction.
Persuasive Communication
Building strong arguments with evidence and delivering convincingly.
Advanced Public Speaking Skills
Overcoming anxiety and refining delivery style, tone, and pace.
Professional Presentation Scenarios
Practicing real-world contexts like pitches and academic talks.
Collaborative Presentation Development
Group work on brainstorming, content creation, and rehearsals.
Peer Review and Refinement
Gaining feedback to improve clarity and coherence.
Critical Reflection and Self-Assessment
Evaluating progress in English proficiency and presentation skills.
Real-World Applications
Applying techniques to professional and academic scenarios.
